video.description:
Directed by Harun Güler | instagram.com/harungu

Music by Ah! Kosmos | www.ahkosmos.com
Premiered on Booooooom: tv.booooooom.com/2018/09/06/premiere-ah-kosmos-wide-feat-ozgur-yilmaz/

DOP. Manuel Schamberger
1st AC. Nils Koppenbrink
2nd AC: Arda Funda

Cast. Başak Günak, Ronja Polzin, David Voigt

1st AD: Regina Wiebe

Hair & Make Up Artist. Kristin Belger
Stylist. Michael Hastreiter

Editor. Harun Güler
Colorist. Simone Schreiner
VFX Artist. Sascha Jörres

Special Thanks. Tuğba Doğan, Duygu Dolunay, Kübra Yavuz, Annika Zubek

video.description:
Directed by Harun Güler  | instagram.com/harungu


Premiered on NOWNESS: https://www.nowness.com/story/pooma-soldier-harun-guler
Featured on Booooooom

5 x Shortlisted - Berlin Fashion Film Festival 2018
Winner of VOTD
Shortlisted Best Music Video - BAFTA Qualifying Aesthetica Short Film Festival 2017
Shortlisted Best Music Video - The Smalls Film Festival 2017
Semi-Finalist - Miami Fashion Film Festival 2017

DOP. Leander Ott
1st AD. Regina Wiebe

Cast. Ruben Amen & Lenny Müller

Make Up Artist. Kristin Belger
Stylist. Annea Mikaela

Editor. Harun Güler
Colorist. Simone Schreiner
Visual Effects. Firebeast.Ageny

Special Thanks. Tuğba Doğan, Kübra Yavuz,
Duygu Dolunay, Sascha Jörres
